aved parents. It can be 
very helpful to talk to another 
parent who has been through 
a similar experience. 
The following organisations 
may help:
The Ectopic Pregnancy 
Trust (www.ectopic.org.uk) 
offers	support	and	information	
for parents who have had an 
ectopic pregnancy. They have 
a helpline on 020 7733 2653 
and can put you in touch with 
other people who have had an 
ectopic pregnancy.
The Miscarriage Association 
(www.miscarriageassociation.
org.uk) can give you 
information and put
